title: International Night
description: Join us for a night full of festivities, games, giveaways, performances, and everyone's favorite, food! Immerse yourself in the unique multicultural society here at ASU, fostered by our community of 10,000+ international students. Best of all, you can experience the beauty of the world first-hand right in your backyard!

eventDetails.description:
SDFC Intramural Fields
ASU Tempe Campus
For your safety, this event adheres to the Sun Devil Athletics clear bag policy
